rules_text:
Encroach [i](Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. If one or more land cards are put into your graveyard this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this.)[/i]
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
